long_description: Made with soft 100% cotton, the Royal Robbins Lennon shirt is a comfortable choice for daily explorations around town. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Includes a drop-in chest pocket with button closure. Bias plaid details on the chest pocket, and front/back yokes add style.
short_description: Made with soft 100% cotton, the Royal Robbins Lennon shirt is a comfortable choice for daily explorations around town.
